page.title: 08SPORT AND LEISURE
page.content: We made up a questionaire about sport and leisure. We sent these home with children from our school. We found that swimming was the most popular sport of all. On our survey we found that women do not play as much sport as men. They did, however, play a wide variety of sport ranging from darts and snooker to badminton and golf. We found that men play snooker, darts and football,some enjoyed doing weight lifting and jogging. The only people who did not have swimming as their favourite sport were young people under 25, they like football best of all. We did have some people who said that they never took part in any sport. Most people took part in some kind of sport at least once a week.
